manipulators.description: Map Tab to Fn, or Tab if pressed alone

rules.description: MacBook numeric keypad, FN+JKL; to 123- etc.

manipulators.description: Change right option to SHyper (i.e., command+control+option+shift)
Change right command to Hyper (i.e., command+control+option)
Change left fn to Super (i.e., shift+command+control)
Map Enter to Ctrl, or Enter if pressed alone
Map Shift to Shift, or Parenthesis if pressed alone
[Bear] Use control+d to toggle todo state
[Bear] Use command+v to paste as plain text

rules.description: [Bear] Use control+command+down/up to move current line(s) down/up

manipulators.description: [Bear] Use control+command+down to move current line(s) down
[Bear] Use control+command+down to move current line(s) up
[Firefox] Use command+shift+n to open new private browsing window
[Apple Mail] Use command+shift+f to search across all mailboxes
